title: Generate custom branded PDF invoices from QuickBooks and email to clients
description:
Automated QuickBooks Invoice to Custom PDF & Email

This n8n workflow automates the entire QuickBooks invoicing process ‚Äî from creation to delivery. When a new invoice is generated in QuickBooks Online, it automatically fetches the data, applies your company branding, converts it into a professional multi-page PDF via Gotenberg, and emails it directly to your client.

Key Features:

‚ö° Fully Automated: Triggers instantly on new QuickBooks invoices.

üßæ Custom Branding: Adds your logo and signature from public URLs.

üé® Modern PDF Design: Clean, professional multi-page layout with smart totals and ‚ÄúPage X of Y‚Äù footers.

üìß Automatic Emailing: Sends the final PDF in a formatted email to your customer.

Requirements:
QuickBooks Online, n8n instance, Gotenberg (HTML‚ÜíPDF converter), and public URLs for logo/signature.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
